request.description:
**Description**
This is API to send OTP

**Parameters**

 - mobile: required
 - otpType: required. Valid values are:
	 - login

**Description**
Use this API to verify the OTP

**Parameters**

 - otp: required
 - mobile: required
 - otpType: required. Valid values are:
	 - login

**Description**
Use this API to authenticate the user.

**Parameters**

 - email: required
 - password: required

**Description**  
Use this API to insert a new user

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   email: required
*   password: required
*   firstName: required
*   lastName: required
*   mobile: optional
*   address: optional
*   aadharNumber: required
*   aadhar: required

**Description**  
Use this API to update the existing user

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   id: required
*   firstName: optional
*   lastName: optional
*   mobile: optional
*   address: optional
*   aadharNumber: optional
*   aadhar: optional

**Description**  
Use this API to list the users

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   page: optional. Default is 1
*   limit: optional. Default is 10
*   orderBy: optional. Default is 'created_at'. Valid values are:
    *   first_name
    *   last_name
    *   full_name
    *   email
    *   created_at
*   order: optional. Default is 'desc'. Valid values are:
    *   asc
    *   desc
*   search: optional

**Description**
Use this API to fetch the user details

**Header**
- Authorization: required

**Parameters**
- id: required.

**Description**  
Use this API to active/deactive the item

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   id: required
*   active: required. Send 'false' to deactive and 'true' to active

**Description**
Use this API to insert the new item category

**Header**
- Authorization: required

**Parameters**
- name: required

**Description**
Use this API to update the existing category

**Header**
- Authorization: required

**Parameters**
- id: required
- name: required

**Description**
Use this API to active/deactive the category

**Header**
- Authorization: required

**Parameters**
- id: required
- active: required. Send 'false' to deactive and 'true' to active

**Description**  
Use this API to list the category

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   page: optional. Default is 1
*   limit: optional. Default is 10
*   orderBy: optional. Default is 'created_at'. Valid values are:
    *   name
    *   created_at
*   order: optional. Default is 'desc'. Valid values are:
    *   asc
    *   desc
*   search: optional
*   showAll: optional. Default is false. If this parameter is true, all the categories will be returned else only 'active' categories will be returned.

**Description**
Use this API to fetch the category details

**Header**
- Authorization: required

**Parameters**
- id: required.

**Description**
Use this API to insert the new item tag

**Header**
- Authorization: required

**Parameters**
- name: required

**Description**
Use this API to update the existing tag

**Header**
- Authorization: required

**Parameters**
- id: required
- name: required

**Description**
Use this API to active/deactive the tag

**Header**
- Authorization: required

**Parameters**
- id: required
- active: required. Send 'false' to deactive and 'true' to active

**Description**  
Use this API to list the tags

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   page: optional. Default is 1
*   limit: optional. Default is 10
*   orderBy: optional. Default is 'created_at'. Valid values are:
    *   name
    *   created_at
*   order: optional. Default is 'desc'. Valid values are:
    *   asc
    *   desc
*   search: optional

**Description**
Use this API to fetch the tag details

**Header**
- Authorization: required

**Parameters**
- id: required.

**Description**  
Use this API to insert a new store

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   name: required
*   gstNo: required
*   cityId: required
*   addr: optional
*   zipcode: optional
*   openingTime: optional. Valid format is (HH:mm)
*   closingTime: optional Valid format is (HH:mm)
*   contactNo: optional. Numbers only
*   imgStore: optional. Multiple images can be sent using the same parameter
*   gstCerti: optional. Only one file can be accepted
*   registrationCerti: optional. Only one file can be accepted

**Description**  
Use this API to update an existing store

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   name: optional
*   gstNo: optional
*   addr: optional
*   zipcode:optional
*   openingTime: optional. Valid format is (HH:mm)
*   closingTime: optional Valid format is (HH:mm)
*   contactNo: optional. Numbers only
*   imgStore: optional. Multiple images can be sent using the same parameter. It will not replace/update files.
*   gstCerti: optional. Only one file can be accepted. It will update the existing gst certificate file
*   registrationCerti: optional. Only one file can be accepted. It will update the existing registration certificate file

**Description**  
Use this API to list the stores

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   page: optional. Default is 1
*   limit: optional. Default is 10
*   orderBy: optional. Default is 'created_at'. Valid values are:
    *   name
    *   created_at
*   order: optional. Default is 'desc'. Valid values are:
    *   asc
    *   desc
*   search: optional
*   showAll: optional. Default is false. If this parameter is true, all the stores will be returned else only 'active' stores will be returned.

**Description**
Use this API to fetch the store details

**Header**
- Authorization: required

**Parameters**
- id: required.

**Description**
Use this API to delete the store asset

**Header**
- Authorization: required

**Parameters**
- id: required

**Description**  
Use this API to active/deactive the store

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   id: required
*   active: required. Send 'false' to deactive and 'true' to active

**Description**
Use this API to list the states

**Header**
- Authorization: required

**Description**  
Use this API to insert a new item

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   code: required
*   name: required
*   price: required
*   category: required. to add multiple category, use the same key. It should be the category id and not category name
*   tag: optional. to add multiple tags, use the same key. It should be the tag id and not tag name
*   discount: optional
*   desp: optional
*   isTodaySpecial: optional. boolean only
*   imgItem: optional. optional. to add multiple images, use the same key.

**Description**  
Use this API to update a existing item

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   id: required.
*   name: required.
*   price: required.
*   category: required. to add multiple category, use the same key. It should be the category id and not category name. **Must send all the selected category ids**.
*   tag: optional. to add multiple tags, use the same key. It should be the tag id and not tag name. **Must send all the selected tag ids**.
*   discount: optional.
*   desp: optional.
*   isTodaySpecial: optional. boolean only
*   imgItem: optional. optional. to add multiple images, use the same key.

**Description** Use this API to list the items

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   page: optional. Default is 1
*   limit: optional. Default is 10
*   categoryId: optional.
*   search: optional
*   showAll: optional. Default is false. If this parameter is true, all the items will be returned else only 'active' items will be returned.
*   orderBy: optional. Default is 'created_at'. Valid values are:
    *   name
    *   price
    *   discount
    *   created_at
*   order: optional. Default is 'desc'. Valid values are:
    *   asc
    *   desc

**Description** Use this API to fetch the item details

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   id: required.

**Description**  
Use this API to active/deactive the item

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   id: required
*   active: required. Send 'false' to deactive and 'true' to active

**Description**  
Use this API to delete the item asset

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   id: required

**Description**  
Use this API to update the existing user

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   id: required
*   firstName: optional
*   lastName: optional
*   dob: optional. date format must be 'yyyy-mm-dd'
*   anniversary: optional. date format must be 'yyyy-mm-dd'
*   isStudent: optional. boolean only.
*   gender: optional. Valid values are:
    *   male
    *   female
*   imgProfile: optional

**Description**  
Use this API to list the customers

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   page: optional. Default is 1
*   limit: optional. Default is 10
*   orderBy: optional. Default is 'created_at'. Valid values are:
    *   first_name
    *   last_name
    *   full_name
    *   dob,
    *   anniversary
    *   created_at
*   order: optional. Default is 'desc'. Valid values are:
    *   asc
    *   desc
*   search: optional

**Description**  
Use this API to active/deactivate the customer

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   id: required
*   active: required. Send 'false' to deactivate and 'true' to active

**Description**  
Use this API to insert contact us details

**Parameters**

*   firstName: required
*   lastName: required
*   desp: required.
*   email: optional.
*   mobile: optional.
    

**Note: Either mobile or email is required.**

**Description**  
Use this API to list the contact us details

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   page: optional. Default is 1
*   limit: optional. Default is 10
*   orderBy: optional. Default is 'created_at'. Valid values are:
    *   first_name
    *   last_name
    *   created_at
*   order: optional. Default is 'desc'. Valid values are:
    *   asc
    *   desc
*   search: optional

**Description**  
Use this API to insert a banner

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   title: required
*   itemName: required
*   imgBanner: required

**Description**  
Use this API to update the existing banner

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   id: required
*   title: optional
*   itemName: optional
*   imgBanner: optional

**Description**  
Use this API to list the banner

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   page: optional. Default is 1
*   limit: optional. Default is 10
*   orderBy: optional. Default is 'created_at'. Valid values are:
    *   title
    *   item_name
    *   created_at
*   order: optional. Default is 'desc'. Valid values are:
    *   asc
    *   desc
*   showAll: optional. Default is false. If this parameter is true, all the banners will be returned else only 'active' banners will be returned.
*   search: optional

**Description**  
Use this API to active/deactivate the banner

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   id: required
*   active: required. Send 'false' to deactivate and 'true' to active

**Description**  
Use this API to insert a new site content

**Parameters**

*   type: required. valid values are:
    *   terms_condition
    *   contact_us
*   content: required.

**Description**  
Use this API to update the existing site content.

**Parameters**

*   id: required.
*   content: required.

**Description**  
Use this API to list the site contents

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   page: optional. Default is 1
*   limit: optional. Default is 10
*   orderBy: optional. Default is 'created_at'. Valid values are:
    *   type
    *   created_at
*   order: optional. Default is 'desc'. Valid values are:
    *   asc
    *   desc
*   search: optional

**Description**  
Use this API to fetch the details of site content by id

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   id: required.

**Description**  
Use this API to fetch the details of site content by type

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   type: required. valid values are:
    *   terms_condition
    *   about_us

**Description**  
Use this API to insert a offer

**Parameters**

*   storeId: required.
*   coupon: required.
*   minOrderAmt: required.
*   discountRate: required.
*   validFrom: required
*   validTo: required

**Description**  
Use this API to update the existing offer.

**Parameters**

*   id: required.
*   minOrderAmt: optional.
*   discountRate: optional.
*   validFrom: optional.
*   validTo: optional.

**Description** Use this API to list the offers

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   page: optional. Default is 1
*   limit: optional. Default is 10
*   storeId: optional.
*   search: optional
*   showAll: optional. Default is false. If this parameter is true, all the items will be returned else only 'active' items will be returned.
*   orderBy: optional. Default is 'created_at'. Valid values are:
    *   coupon
    *   min_order_amt
    *   discount_rate
    *   valid_from
    *   valid_to
    *   store_name
    *   created_at
*   order: optional. Default is 'desc'. Valid values are:
    *   asc
    *   desc

**Description**  
Use this API to active/deactivate the offer

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   id: required
*   active: required. Send 'false' to deactivate and 'true' to active

**Description**  
Use this API to create the order

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   storeId: required
*   coupon: optional
*   items: required. It must an array of the objects.
    *   id: required. It's an item id
    *   qty: required.

**Note:- In return you will get the razor pay Order ID which you can use further to initiate the payment on the razor pay.**

**Description**  
Use this API to checkout the order

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   id: required. it's an order id and not the razor pay order it.
*   paymentId: required.
*   signature: required.
    

**Note:- When the payment is done using razor, you will get the payment id and signature.**

**Description** Use this API to get all my orders

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   type: required. valid values are:
    *   upcoming
    *   past
*   page: optional. Default is 1
*   limit: optional. Default is 10

**Description** Use this API to list the cities

**Header**

*   Authorization: required
    

**Parameters**

*   stateId: required.
